options.name: 1) Hi coco! Can you tell me what makes you special compared to other robots?
2) Wow, that sounds awesome! I love the idea of a robot that can dance and show emotions. Can you show me your favorite dance move?
3) Sure, but Iâ€™m a little shy to dance! Do you ever get nervous performing in front of people?
4) hmm... okay, maybe just a tiny move! can you teach me a super simple step i can do right now, even if i'm sitting down?
5) This is actually kind of fun! I like the idea of pretending to catch stars. Do you ever imagine you're somewhere else when you dance, like on a stage or in space?
